text: Today is our very last day in Hanoi.

We are leaving Vietnam, so as a little farewell
we are going to be watching a Water Puppet

Performance in the Old Quarter and this is
something that is very traditional in Vietnam.
I've been to a water puppet performance before.
It is quite an animated and exciting show.

The water puppets are very active in the water
and it is going to be fascinating to go again

So there are ten acts in this performance
and it is mostly focused on folk stories and

some of them include, as in this brochure,
a fan dance, a Cham dance and a pan pipe dance.
